learning-angularjs.title: Learning AngularJS
learning-angularjs.subtitle: Starting with Application Structure
learning-angularjs.content: This would be the content of the post. I wonder if AngularJS automatically escapes HTML elements.

learning-angularjs-part-2.title: Learning AngularJS: Part 2
learning-angularjs-part-2.subtitle: Angular UI Router
learning-angularjs-part-2.content:
Since Angular actually does allow HTML to be dumped into the page from a variable, I'm going to abuse that. What I should really do is see if there's a way of making it not do that.

This is working okay so far though. Resolve seems very handy.
